metadata.description:
Tempo Synced Pre-Delay ====================== Author: Doc Shadrach
A pre-delay effect synced to your project's tempo in Reaper. Ideal for creating rhythmic spaces before a reverb.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Initial release.

metadata.description:
LevelMatch Core ====================== Author: Doc Shadrach
A measurement tool that helps to match gain stages.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Initial release.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: It shows the algorithms in TCP.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Bug fix and LUFS as Default.

metadata.description:
V-Clamp ====================== Author: Doc Shadrach
A sender/receiver wrapper for Neural Amp Modeler in REAPER. Features asymmetric push/pull drive, component drift, and crosstalk to humanize mono captures.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Initial release.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Added component drift (gain fluctuation) with DC Blocker.

metadata.description:
NAM Alignment Tool ====================== Author: Doc Shadrach
A small utility to remove latency from NAM captures.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Initial release.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: The gain parameter has been removed.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Now it goes up to -500 samples.

metadata.description:
NAM Latency Analyzer ====================== Author: Doc Shadrach
An utility to detect the amount of latency in NAM captures.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Initial release.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Gain detection has been removed.

metadata.description:
The Bass Foundry ====================== Author: Doc Shadrach
A very versatile bass saturator.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Initial release.

metadata.description:
The Depth Control ====================== Author: Doc Shadrach
A simple plugin to add depth to the elements of a mix.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Initial release.

metadata.description:
RBJ Filters for TCP ====================== Author: Doc Shadrach
High pass and low pass filters to embed in the TCP.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Initial release.

metadata.description:
The Best DeEsser ====================== Author: Doc Shadrach
A precision deesser based on the Airwindows DeBess code.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Initial release.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Changed the direction of the Max Reduction slider.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: The input and output pins are now declared.

metadata.description:
Speaker Soul Engine ====================== Author: Doc Shadrach
A plugin to bring guitar cabinet IRs to life and add realism.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Initial release.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Added Detector Weighting and "Dirty Thump" saturation for realistic air movement simulation.

metadata.description:
The Analog Molecule ====================== Author: Doc Shadrach
Professional 180-Channel 3D Console Emulator.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Initial release.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Bypass State now is called Global State.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Added auto-preset logic based on topology.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Now the plugin is more efficient, more stable, and more realistic.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Now with different Crosstalk modes and new button colors.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Improvements in overall stability and bug fixes.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Optimized rail physics and main control buttons now use a larger, bolder font.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Recalibrated Slew Rate formula for better transient preservation. Tuned default values for a more modern, punchy console sound. Improved Bus Topology speed response.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Added Output Gain slider for precise level matching. Fixed potential "ghost distortion" in Bypass mode.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Now with internal presets, smart link system, output micro-trim and duplicate ID detection.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: New GUI with bigger buttons and letters.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: NEW SOUND ENGINE ADDED!! Now you can choose between two different engines.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Minor update to shorten a word in the GUI.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Now with HP and LP filters that can be embedded in TCP.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: BUG FIX: Filter calculation fixed.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: BUG FIX: Prevent filters from clicking on their first launch.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Improvements to the linking system.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Reducing atomic memory bus contention at high samplerates.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: The entire logic of the Presets system has been improved.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Added denormal protection to all DSP stages to prevent CPU spikes during silence.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: HOT FIX. Correcting the formula for denormal protection.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: BUG FIX. Fixed the logic of the preset system that caused the crosstalk to trigger on its own when it was OFF.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: BUG FIX. Several conflicts that caused things to turn on and off by themselves have been fixed.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: BUG FIX. Further adjustments regarding the parameter detection system.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Attempting to improve xtalk's performance on modern CPUs.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Another optimization that now makes it perform better.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: There is now a Mix/Render button to prevent stuttering when rendering the song.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Returning to the default setting for Bus Calibration: Normal.

metadata.description:
The Hot Summer ====================== Author: Doc Shadrach
A 16-ch Analog-Like Stem Summer.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Initial release.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Huge update changing the transformer emulation.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Calibrated transformer IIR for sample rate independence.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Re-engineered the architecture with atomic thread safety, true hard-bypass, and state scrubbing for bulletproof stability.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Implemented Hybrid PSU architecture, Capacitive Crosstalk, API harmonic fix, Compact UI, and recalibrated scales.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Gravity compressor added.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Modification in the oversampling stage to avoid the loss of high frequencies.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: The plugin no longer has built-in oversampling. There is a script available to easily enable Reaper's native oversampling on all instances.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Added denormal protection to all DSP stages to prevent CPU spikes during silence.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: HOT FIX. Correcting the formula for denormal protection.

metadata.description:
The SSL-Style EQ ====================== Author: Doc Shadrach
Equalizer based on the curves and behavior of the SSL 4000 E/G Series.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Initial release.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: The input and output pins are now declared.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Now the filters are in series and not in parallel.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Resonant Shelves and bug fixes.

metadata.description:
The SSL-Style Ch Comp ====================== Author: Doc Shadrach
Channel Compressor based on the dynamics and behavior of the SSL 4000 E/G Series.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Initial release.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: BUG FIX: Changing denorm formula.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: The input and output pins are now declared.

metadata.description:
Oxide Glass Saturator ====================== Author: Doc Shadrach
A combination of tube and tape saturation.

version.author: Doc Shadrach
version.changelog: Initial release.
